body.name: XAMHUS Small Crossbody Bag for Men - Waterproof Men Crossbody Bag for Travelling and Daily Use
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Saturday, February 17. Order within 4 hrs 5 mins
features: 【Mini Size & Enough Capacity 】8.66" tall, 6.29" wide, and 0.98" thick (22cm*16cm*2.5cm). Small crossbody bag but enough space for you to carry your phone, cards, cash, keys, airpods, other small accessories while you go out anytime.

【Portable Design & Multiple Scenarios】Use for travelling and daily commuting, jogging, walking the dog, running, hiking, cycling, shopping and more activities. Lightweight and small sling bag, you won't feel uncomfortable even if you wear it for a long time!

【Premium & Durable Material】 Constructed with high-quality nylon fabric and durable zippers that last. The lightweight men crossbody bag includes the large main area with 1 inner pocket and 1 inner mesh slot, as well as 1 outer front zipper pocket. With water-resistant function, the bag sheds water in the rain, dries quickly and wipes clean easily. This small crossbody bag for men and women is durable, easy to clean and supports machine washing.

【Comfortable & Adjustable】The shoulder strap of mini sling bag is made of a woven fabric that is wider, comfortable, durable, easy to adjust and any slack is held down with a thick elastic band. Expands from 23.6" to 39.4" (60 to 110cm) and suitable for different heights and body types. A clasp at the side of the bag to open is super simple to press the button to open up and closes just as easily an securely.

【Helpful After-sales Service】Just let us know if there is any problems, we will offer a full one-year replacement service for all of crossbody sling bags in our store. The 2024 newest improved version and premium mini crossbody bag on the material, which makes your life more convenient!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Size: Small Crossbody Bag: 8.66” tall, 6.29” wide, and 0.98” thick (22cm*16cm*2.5cm), easy to carry and storage any type of mobile phone, wallet, keys, airpods, glasses and other small daily necessities.Material: Passed the material safety test and certification. Using high-quality nylon fabric, we can ensure that the crossbody bag does not have any odor and the shoulder bag you received is consistent with the pictures.Construction: 1 main zipper pocket + 1 front zipper pocket+1 inner independent pocket , an inner mesh independent compartment in the main zipper pocket is easier to storage and removal.Adjustment: Widened shoulder bag strap and made of braided technology, which is softer and easier to adjust, adjustment range is 23.6"-39.4" (60-110cm).Essential and practical crossbody bag for going out, just need to carry your daily necessaries, such as the wallet, cell phone, passport, airpods and keys. Any time, you can go out to walk the dog, jogging, running, hiking, cycling, travelling and outdoor sports.
*Warm Reminder: Practical and portable design, please carefully confirm the size of the small crossbody bag to avoid the bag you receive is not consistent with your expected size.

The Small Crossbody Bag Designed for Daily Cycling Jogging Outdoors Hiking Running Climbing Traveling and More. Frequently asked questions & answers: 1. Is the small crossbody bag consistent with the picture? Yes, the crossbody bag you receive will be consistent with the picture, each messenger bag has passed multiple quality inspections before shipment. We can ensure that the bag has no any quality problems. However, if you find that the product has slight wrinkles or traces of use after receiving the product, it may be caused by pressure during shipping. If you encounter this situation, please let us know in time,we will help you to deal with and replace as soon as possible. 2. What is the size of the mini messenger bag, and what size cell phone can it hold? It's 8.66” tall, 6.29” wide, and 0.98” thick (22cm*16cm*2.5cm). Generally speaking, the messenger bag can hold any type of cell phones. If you are worried about it could not hold your mobile phone after receiving the bag, you can confirm the length, width and height of your phone before purchasing, as long as the size of your cell phone is smaller than the size of our messenger bag, our bag will can fit your Kindle, phone, such as Kindle paperwhite series, iPhone 14 13 12 11 X XR series and more other phones. 3. What is the material of the small bag messenger, has it passed the relevant safe certification of the material, and is there any odor after receiving? Using high-quality nylon fabric and it passed the relevant material safety test and certification. we can ensure that the small messenger bag does not have any odor after receiving. 4. If I am not satisfied with the quality of the small shoulder bag, can I return it at any time during the sales support? we provide helpful before-sale service for our small shoulder bag, if you have any questions, please feel free to let us know, we will provide you help at any time within the 1-year sales support.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I originally bought this for my husband because he needs something to put his belongings in when he’s out due to the fact he’s always losing something lol. He actually loves it. It’s small, lightweight but with just enough space. You can comfortably fit your most important things in it without it being too congested. It’s crossbody and the strap is comfortable. The fabric is high quality so it doesn’t look or feel cheaply made. Get one. I don’t think you can go wrong with it. Planning on getting myself one pretty soon.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This bag is great!
reviews.reviewText: This bag is great I have been looking for a bag that I can put stuff in when we go somewhere and not have something bulky to carry. The bag is very well made plus it is a cute bag. Very sturdy and holds just what I need. It has two zipper compartments plus a spot inside to put my phone. Won’t be disappointed in this bag.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice material and my husband likes it!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I bought this bag for my husband for our cruise vacation and I can personally use it myself.This bag definitely looks great and my husband loves it! It’s definitely versatile and comfortable to wear and has a good amount of pockets. I I highlyrecommend this crossbody especially if you’re thinking on going on a trip.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing crossbody bag!!!!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This light blue crossbody bag is not only stylish but also incredibly practical. Its compact design makes it easy to carry, while the adjustable strap ensures a comfortable fit. The quality craftsmanship is evident in every detail, from the sturdy zippers to the durable fabric. With multiple compartments, it offers excellent organization for your essentials. Whether you're on a casual outing or a busy day, this bag adds a pop of color and functionality to your style.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My teenager loves this!
reviews.reviewText: This bag is a la mode right now. This is unisex but my teenage son loves it. It's a quality material and waterproof. That's important if they're going to wear it to Six Flags or some other theme park. It fits a kindle, a phone, and a wallet. Just enough space for the important items. You won't regret this purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A perfect size crossbag
reviews.reviewText: I am extremely pleased with this crossbag. I bought this bag for me, not my husband. It is the perfect size to carry my phone, cash, credit cards and a few other things. It has a strong strap and buckle that don't come unlatched. I love to use it when I go to the flea markets/ yard sales as it keeps both my hands free to look at items. I also like to use it as my main purse because this bag I just cross it over my shoulder and it is always with me. I wont set it somewhere and leave it. Now just to get it in different colors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Thin but cute
reviews.reviewText: He likes it, so that’s what matters.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect bag for my large phone (Galaxy S23 Ultra), battery pack, charging cable and keys
reviews.reviewText: Bag capacity: I have a similar bag, but it is smaller and can barely hold my large cell phone (Samsung Galaxy S23 Ultra). However, this bag easily hold my cell phone, a 10,000Mah battery pack and charging cable with ease. As the bag's dimensions are 8.6 inch x 6.25 inch, it is certainly large enough to hold these items and my car keys.Pockets: Inside the main compartment there is a mesh divider to separate your items. Likely it is good for flatter items to put inside the mesh pocket or smaller bulky items. There's also the outer pocket with a separate zipper. Overall they are roomy, but I would recommend the bag for more rectangular shape items. Bulky items or round shaped will make it more difficult to hold and zipper up.Zippers: are easy to pull open and closed, the pull ties make it simple to find the zippers. There was no problem using the zippers at all, they did not stick or catch when using them.Strap: The strap is easy to adjust and any slack is held down with a thick elastic band. There is a clasp at the side of the bag to open the strap and avoid having to lift the bag over your head. The clasp is super simple to press the button to open up and closes just as easily an securely. There were no issues closing the clasp. I'm 5ft, 9in tall, and I found a comfortable length of a little more than half the strap. So it will certainly be long enough for a much taller person to use.Usage: I really enjoy using the bag. It is the perfect size to hold my daily essentials (phone, battery charger, cable, wallet and keys). I have been wearing the bag in two ways, either with the bag on the front of my body and on my back. With it's compact size, I can also wear the bag under my jacket and it is barely noticeable... very discreet. My only downside is that the bag tends to tilt towards the middle of my body due to the weight of the items inside. Tightening the strap does help a little. Otherwise, this is my new daily use bag.
